lead_paragraph: When street-gang thieves slipped with ease into a Norfolk Southern rail yard on Chicago's South Side and ripped locks off one train, they likely expected to see merchandise like toys or tennis shoes. What they beheld instead was a gangster's jackpot: box after box of brand new guns.

headline.main: Lillard Scores 33 as Trail Blazers Beat Thunder 114-109
